triviaQuestions.question: To which family does the bass drum belong?
triviaQuestions.hint: Here's a hint: percuss in Latin, meaning "to strike"...
triviaQuestions.followupFact: The head of a bass drum can be struck with either mallets, sticks or brushes, depending on what kind of sounds you want.

triviaQuestions.question: What is the name of the part of the Bass Drum which you're meant to hit?
triviaQuestions.hint: Close! Try using your noggin to figure this one out...
triviaQuestions.followupFact: Snare drum heads were originally made from animal skins, but not so much these days.

triviaQuestions.question: Instruments in the Percussion family typically have what job in the Orchestra?
triviaQuestions.hint: Here's a hint: playing with the rhythm means keeping what?
triviaQuestions.followupFact: While the conductor is in charge of it all, percussion instruments help everyone to play at the same speed!
